examples: He failed to interview a key witness.
No pudo entrevistar a un testigo clave.
Police have appealed for witnesses to the accident.
La policía ha pedido testigos del accidente.
We have a witness to the killing.
According to witnesses, the man jumped out of his vehicle and attacked the other driver.
Según testigos, el hombre saltó de su vehículo y agredió al otro conductor.
